itemInfo.itemName: Magic Crystal of Infinity - Melee Defense
itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Armor sockets. 
- Item Effect: Melee Damage Reduction +2
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Essence of the Sun
item.desc: An essence extracted from Fruit of the Sun, a fruit obtained at a low rate through Farming. It's used as an ingredient in Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Can be made by combining other ingredients with Fruit of the Sun using Alchemy.

item.name: Magic Crystal of Crimson Flame - Precision
item.desc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Weapon sockets. 
- Item Effect: All Accuracy +1
※ This magic crystal has a high chance of shattering if your Character dies.

- Equipment can be transfused through Black Spirits.

item.name: Wise Man's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Red Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Red Crystals found near Khuruto Cave.
